au.org.massive.oauth2_hpc.ssh

Class SSHCertificateGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • au.org.massive.oauth2_hpc.ssh.SSHCertificateGenerator

  • public class SSHCertificateGenerator
extends java.lang.Object
    Signs ssh-rsa public keys and produces a certificate

    • Nested Class Summary

      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  SSHCertificateGenerator.SSHCertType
      Allowed certificate types

      Allowed SSH critical options

      Allowed SSH extensions
      private static interface  SSHCertificateGenerator.SSHOptions
      Interface for SSHCertificateGenerator.SSHExtensions and SSHCertificateGenerator.SSHCriticalOptions
      private static class  SSHCertificateGenerator.SSHOptionsComparator
      Comparator to facilitate lexical ordering required by the certificate specification

    • Method Detail

      • generateSSHCertificate

        public static java.lang.String generateSSHCertificate(SSHCertificateOptions options,
                                                      java.security.interfaces.RSAPublicKey caPubKey,
                                                      java.security.interfaces.RSAPrivateKey caPrivKey)
                                               throws java.io.IOException,
                                                      java.security.InvalidKeyException,
                                                      java.security.SignatureException
        Signs a public key to produce a certificate
        Parameters:
        options - certificate signing options
        caPubKey - the public key of the CA
        caPrivKey - the private key of the CA
        Returns:
        a certificate
        Throws:
        java.security.InvalidKeyException - thrown if the keys are invalid
        java.security.SignatureException - thrown if a signature could not be generated
        java.io.IOException

      • signCert

        private static byte[] signCert(SSHCertificateOptions options,
                               java.security.interfaces.RSAPublicKey caPubKey,
                               java.security.interfaces.RSAPrivateKey caPrivKey)
                        throws java.io.IOException,
                               java.security.InvalidKeyException,
                               java.security.SignatureException
        Produces a certificate byte array. The result is formatted by generateSSHCertificate(SSHCertificateOptions, RSAPublicKey, RSAPrivateKey)
        Parameters:
        options - certificate signing options
        caPubKey - the public key of the CA
        caPrivKey - the private key of the CA
        Returns:
        certificate as a byte array
        Throws:
        java.security.InvalidKeyException - thrown if the keys are invalid
        java.security.SignatureException - thrown if a signature could not be generated
        java.io.IOException
